meta_description: Our collections, exhibitions and educational programs are designed to inspire curiosity and conversations about our past who we are and what makes us unique

admission_text:
## One membership, three museums, endless connections!

Invest in your community — become an MVC member or renew your membership today!

Become a member of the Museum of Ventura County and discover the rich art, culture, and history of this vibrant region at our three campuses.

Not only is your membership an investment in yourself, with perks at every level, it’s a pledge to celebrate and uplift the vibrant communities we serve. What’s more, every membership fee is **100% tax deductible** *, amplifying the impact of your generosity and providing you a year-end deduction.

What is NARM? 

At the Adventurer level (previously Associate) and above, your MVC membership grants you free admission to over 1,300 additional museums! The [North American Reciprocal Museum (NARM) Association](https://narmassociation.org/) is an extensive network of hundreds of cultural institutions across the continent that accept your MVC membership card for entry. Beginning at a price of just $12.50 a month, this exciting membership perk affords you unprecedented access to a world of discovery and culture.

**The best way to make a sustaining impact on the Museum of Ventura County is to pay your membership dues monthly! Monthly payment options start at just $6.25 per month.**

By becoming a member, you fuel MVC’s educational initiatives, outreach efforts, dynamic art and history exhibits, Research Library, and the preservation of the region’s rich culture.

[Join, Renew, or Gift a Membership](https://i...
